name: Rockstar Kush
description: Rockstar Kush, also known as BC Rockstar, is a popular strain in British Columbia renowned for its excellent medical qualities. This hybrid of Rockstar and Bubba Kush emits a heavy odor of skunk and piney Kush. Rockstar Kush, a heavy indica, helps patients overcome aches, pains, and anxieties with its relaxing effects that also stimulate a reduced appetite.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Hungry, Euphoric, Sleepy, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Anxious
